thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Connect Group Says Disposal Of Books Division To Aurelius

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Connect Group Says Disposal Of Books Division To Aurelius

organizations.name: brief-connect group says disposal of books division to aurelius

text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Connect Group Plc:
* DISPOSAL OF BOOKS DIVISION TO AURELIUS * DISPOSAL OF BOOKS DIVISION TO AURELIUS * ‍HAS AGREED REVISED TERMS AND COMPLETED DISPOSAL OF ITS BOOKS DIVISION​
* ‍DEAL FOR A TOTAL CASH CONSIDERATION OF £6M WHICH WAS PAID AT COMPLETION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
